Headline: 146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express & #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute at Inner Lake Shore/Strafford
ShortDescription: #146 & #151 buses are rerouted via Inner Lake Shore, Belmont, Broadway, Addison and Inner Lake Shore: due to, street blockage near Inner Lake Shore/Strafford.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express & #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Inner Lake Shore, Belmont, Broadway, Addison and Inner Lake Shore: due to, street blockage near Inner Lake Shore/Strafford.

Allow extra travel time.
